import "./cart.css" import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import request from "../../utils/request"; import images from "../../assets/images"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; function Cart() { const [itemCarts, setItemCart] = useState([]); const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); const id = urlParams.get('id'); useEffect(() => { request.get(`/api/infoCart`, {params: {matk : localStorage.getItem('auth_matk')}}) .then(res => { setItemCart([...res.data.data].reverse()); }) .catch(e => { console.log(e); }) }, []) return(
